name: Opes Favicon
author: Pawe≈Ç Twardziak

sections.description:
Opes Favicon allows you to add and manage favicons & icons on your WordPress website using WordPress media library and custom URL.

Completely new! Check it!

Major features in Opes Favicon include:

  • Favicon URL validation
  • Automatic generation all favicons & icons
  • Support mobile devices
  • All favicons & icons are set in the root
sections.installation:
• Upload the Opes Favicon plugin to your blog and Activate it
  • Go to “Appearance->Opes Favicon” and set your website favicons & icons

Release Date – 10th January, 2015

  • Automatic generation all favicons & icons
  • Support mobile devices
  • All favicons & icons are set in the root

1.1.1

Release Date – 7th January, 2015

  • Change sizes for generation of .ico files of the favicons for older IE browsers from (32×32 and 64×64) to (16×16 and 32×32)
  • Fix bug while generation of .ico files of the favicons (16×16 and 32×32) for older IE browsers

1.1.0

Release Date – 7th January, 2015

  • Added division into the front-end favicon and the admin page favicon
  • Added generation of .ico files of the favicons (32×32 and 64×64) for older IE browsers
  • Added enable/disable the favicons

1.0.1

Release Date – 6th January, 2015

1.0.0
